content: After Nolitusne got your answer, he left your class satisfied.
Every day after that, you worked very hard at listening to the class and were very active in asking the teacher for help if you didn't know something.
On one occasion, when you came out of the teacher's office after asking a question, you ran into Nolitusne in the hallway.

speaker: Nolitusne
content: I've seen you heading to the office lately, so you seem to be very concerned about this game too.

speaker: Me
content: Indeed, after all, I made a deal with you, and I don't want to lose.

speaker: Nolitusne
content: I used to think that you didn't want to compete with me, but I didn't expect you to work so hard now, are you afraid that I will beat you?

chooseItem.text: Yeah, since you didn't think you'd beat me before, I won't let you beat me this time either.
This is my agreement with you, and I will do my best to fulfill it.
